item.title: 股市的 "一月效应 "是真的吗？
item.description: 几十年来，一种流行的理论认为，美国股市在一月份的涨幅往往高于其他月份。这种现象被称为 "一月效应"，它的存在曾一度似乎是不可否认的，因为研究表明，一月份的涨幅是平均月份的数倍。从 1940 年到 20 世纪 70 年代中期，这种效应在小型公司股票中最为明显。但到 2000 年左右，这种效应似乎有所减弱，此后就不再那么可靠了。【原文：For decades, a popular theory has held that US stocks tend to rise more in January than in other months. The existence of this phenomenon, known as the January effect, once appeared to be undeniable as studies showed gains several times larger in January than in an average month. The effect was most pronounced among small-company stocks from 1940 to the mid-1970s. But it seemed to shrink through around 2000 and hasn’t been as reliable since.】
